Interface CassandraEntityStoreService

  • All Superinterfaces:

 @Mixins(value=CassandraEntityStoreMixin.class)
public interface CassandraEntityStoreService
extends EntityStore, EntityStateVersions, ServiceActivation, LockingAbstractComposite, Configuration
